name: Chasing its Light (a snippet)
description: A project for class that I used to develop an idea for one of our future games. It follows Noor, a man who can feel emotions through the eyes of others, but can't feel any himself. Though at his father's funeral he finds something that may give him the ability to emote, and will go to any lengths to grasp what he once viewed as unobtainable treasures.
